title: The Blues Collection = Martin Scorsese presents The Blues a musical journey [DVD]
other_title: Martin Scorsese presents The Blues Film Collection
subject_group: Music & Performing Arts/Music - History and criticism
description: Seven documentary films individually directed with the director's own viewpoint on the history of blues music. The series is presented by Martin Scorsese and is described in the trailer as "a musical journey to the roots of rock, soul and hip hop". Directors include Mike Figgis, Clint Eastwood, Charles Burnett, Wim Wenders, Richard Pearce, Rober Kenner, and Marc Levin.  -- [319237] Red White and Blues (Figgis) -- [319233] Piano Blues (Eastwood) -- [319234] Warming by the Devil's fire (Burnett) -- [319235] The Soul of a man (Wenders) -- [319236] The Road to Memphis (Pearce, Kenner) -- [319238] Godfathers and sons (Levin) -- [319239] Feel like going home (Scosese)
